Generation IX.Scarlet: It searches for food all day. It possesses a keen sense of smell but doesn’t use it for anything other than foraging.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon spurns all but the finest of foods. Its body gives off an herblike scent that bug Pokémon detest.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three , Area Four , Area Five , Poco Path , Pokémon League East Province: Area One , Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Two , Area Three , Area Four , Area Five , Poco Path , Pokémon League East Province: Area One , Area Two Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
